java.io
Class FileReader

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.io.Reader
        |
        +--java.io.InputStreamReader
              |
              +--java.io.FileReader
public class FileReader
extends InputStreamReader

Untamed: Convenience class for reading character files. The constructors of this class assume that the default character encoding and the default byte-buffer size are appropriate. To specify these values yourself, construct an InputStreamReader on a FileInputStream.

FileReader is meant for reading streams of characters. For reading streams of raw bytes, consider using a FileInputStream.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
1.13, 02/02/06
Author:
Mark Reinhold
See Also:
InputStreamReader, FileInputStream
